Senior Server Engineer, Limbic

San Francisco, California or Köln, Germany

ONSITE

We're looking for an experienced game developer to work on an undisclosed PvP, server-based, 3D mobile game. This role will work closely with front-end engineers to create the supporting backend for gameplay systems and features.

To apply, send your resume and cover letter, including a list of your five favorite mobile games to: jobs@limbic.com

Include: "Senior Server Engineer, Hacker News" in the subject line of your email.

http://www.limbic.com/careers.html
